posting.title: [ECorp] OP TakeDown with fSociety - final part

mission.posting: Join the conjoint op "TakeDown" with fSociety to shutdown the ECorp network

email.subject: RE: OP TakeDown - Steel Mountains Final Strike SUCCESS
email.body:
Congratz #PLAYERNAME#,
Now it's over... ECorp is officially dead.... Thanks #PLAYERNAME#... We'll stay in touch with you, don't waste your skills....
-fSociety
